#summary A library exposing the TOM.NET API in Java by use of JNI.

= Introduction =

This API provides a proxy to the TOM.NET API from Java. It uses [http://jni4net.sourceforge.net/ JNI4NET] to make the cross VM calls and it was generated automatically using ProxyGen.
